channel.title: Flagstaff on ~ The Tobyblog 📝
channel.description: Recent content in Flagstaff on ~ The Tobyblog 📝

item.title: Road Trip Travel Log 02.01
item.description: On the road from Albuquerque to Flagstaff, near which we turn south to Red Rock State Park in Arizona. The kids are keen to get in a hike today, the first “real” day of our vacation, as far as I’m concerned. It’s been fun watching the younger two get excited over taking pictures from the car with the little Instax Mini. That was Kassi’s great idea. We bought Anthony around 150 exposures and his eyes got wide when I told him I wanted him to use every single one by the end of the trip.
